creator: sp_greenberg@hotmail.com
text:
The J2EE spec says HttpSession.setMaxInactiveInterval( int ) takes a time 
interval in seconds for a session.  However, calling this on a Tomcat 
HttpSession implementation set the timeout in minutes.

All I can see in the current code (4.1.24) indicates that the time is in seconds
(the default value being 60 * session timeout in minutes). Can you point out
where there is a problem ?
creator: remm@apache.org
